org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer
Class NetworkClient

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.NetworkClient

public class NetworkClient
extends Object

Author:
Ali this class will allow the user to connect between the er and and a friend. The class uses and online server called jabber.org and both the user and the friend go in as clients and the servers will send the messages in between
